Surefire is maven's default test-runner. It serves a bucketload of use-case=
s, some of which are *far* off from what I'd do in my own tests. If the use=
r decides to use loggers or system out is not really something we want to d=
ictate. 

As a humoristic example, let me mention the issue we had on this =
guy spawning threads from a test that were producing console output for the=
 entire test run that was collected by a JVM shutdown hook. 

Kristian
